Module de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk
Package de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk.provided

Class BasicTaskInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.jvk.provided.BasicTaskInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskInformation
    public class BasicTaskInformation
extends Object
implements TaskInformation
    Class for storing task information and task state for TaskVerifier.

    An object of this class is immutable and all update methods create a new object of this class!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BasicTaskInformation​(String title, String description)
      Set title and description.
      BasicTaskInformation​(String title, String description, TaskVerificationStatus status)
      Set title, description and status of the task.
      BasicTaskInformation​(String title, String description, TaskVerificationStatus status, List<? extends TaskInformation> subTasks)
      Set title, description, status and subtasks of the task.
      BasicTaskInformation​(String title, String description, List<? extends TaskInformation> subTasks)
      Set title, description and subtasks of the task.
